pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - BlissfulNights BlissfulNights Home About us Rooms Contact Privacy Policy of BlissfulNights BlissfulNights values your privacy and adheres to stringent standards in the collection, processing, and protection of your personal information. Our privacy policy outlines the procedures and policies governing the utilization of your personal data when you visit our website or engage with our services. Data Collection and Utilization We collect and process personal data for legitimate business purposes, such as administering bookings, providing customer support, and enhancing our services' quality. Data Security Measures We implement robust security measures to safeguard your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Your Privacy Rights You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data held by us. Additionally, you can object to the processing of your data or request data portability. Contact Us If you have questions about our privacy policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at blissfulnights@gmail.com. This privacy policy is effective as of 2024. We may update this policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. The BlissfulNights website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline BlissfulNights Your destination for exquisite stay in hotel . pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - BlissfulNights BlissfulNights Home About us Rooms Contact Terms and Conditions of BlissfulNights Welcome to the terms and conditions ("Terms") of BlissfulNights. These Terms govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms. Booking and Reservations When making a reservation or booking through our website or other platforms, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. We reserve the right to cancel or modify bookings based on availability or other factors. Cancellation and Refunds Cancellation policies vary based on the type of reservation and rate chosen. Please review the specific cancellation policy associated with your booking. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed according to our refund policy. Guest Conduct We strive to maintain a welcoming and respectful environment for all guests. We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate stays, or take other appropriate action if guests engage in disruptive or inappropriate behavior. Limitation of Liability BlissfulNights shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our services, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or goodwill. Changes to Terms We may update or modify these Terms from time to time. Changes will be effective upon posting on our website.
